course.subject: TEMG
course.name: Special Project: Innovation for Harman Lifestyle Audio
course.description: HARMAN International is an US-based global leader in the development, manufacture and marketing of high quality, high-fidelity audio products and digitally integrated audio and infotainments systems for the automotive industry. Students selected for this corporate-sponsored class will be formed into teams to work on various HARMAN Lifestyle Audio products and coached by the corresponding global product manager. This project does not require programming. This project is opened to all HKUST students, but priority will be given to students from the Dual-Degree Program and Interdisciplinary Programs Office. Enrolment requires approval of the course instructor.
